parameters.name: hosts
parameters.description: A list of node names, like node1.foo.com:27017. Port is optional, it is 27017 by default.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the collection to open.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The selection criteria for the update.

parameters.name: upsert
parameters.description: If set to true, creates a new document when no document matches the query criteria. If set to false, does not insert a new document when no match is found.

parameters.name: multi
parameters.description: If set to true, updates multiple documents that meet the query criteria. If set to false, updates one document.
